title: Serious Sam Classic: The First Encounter
notes: Major visual glitches with OpenGL renderer. dx9 renderer blackscreens

title: Serious Sam Classic: The First Encounter
notes: To fix depth buffer issue, set gap_iDepthBits to 24 either by console or in ./Scripts/PersistentSymbols.ini (info from https://appdb.winehq.org/objectManager.php?sClass=version&iId=4576#notes).

title: Serious Sam Classic: The First Encounter
notes: Visual glitches with OpenGL renderer(walls and moving doors are completely transparent). Dx9 renderer blackscreens

title: Serious Sam Classic: The First Encounter
notes: OpenGL rendered seems fine with no glitches. DX9 renderer black screens. Don't try to Alt-tab the game.

title: Serious Sam Classic: The First Encounter
